thread.title: Fatal Error. Attempting to save in .....

post.author: darknesz
post.body:
I get this error after the exportmodel command, than quake crashs and i'm on the desktop.
is someone know this error



i searched with google, some people mean that is a driver prob but i tried tons of drivers and nothing happens...
now i hope i get some help in this forum.
thx

post.author: []v[]
post.body:
http://www.3dbuzz.com/vbforum/showthrea ... ge=2&pp=10

some answers here that may help.

post.author: darknesz
post.body:
big thx for your answer.
but the tripplebuffer error the prob ,i get the same message..

post.author: darknesz
post.body:
ok i got it.

i have downloaded vmware and installed a winxp, maya and quake new.
now i dont get this error.

but

now i get this "CreateMesh: No skinClusters found in this scene"
but i think this is a model error...
